label: 蓮禅
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?1082-?, active early twelfth century), shaku 釈 (the monk"). Lay name Fujiwara no Sukemoto. Took the tonsure in his thirties. Friend of Fujiwara no Chikamitsu; they once traveled together to Kyushu. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (58). [藤原資基、藤原周光、九州、漢詩] "
